verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
verses.english: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
verses.hausa: Albarka ta tabbata ga wanda Ya saukar da (Littãfi) mai rarrabẽwa a kan bãwanSa, dõmin ya kasance mai gargaɗi ga halitta.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٌ فِى ٱلْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ تَقْدِيرًا
verses.english: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.
verses.hausa: wanda Yake da mulkin sammai da ƙasa kuma bai riƙi abin haihuwa ba, kuma abõkin tãrayya bai kasance a gare Shi ba a cikin mulkinSa kuma Ya halitta dukan kowane abu, sa'an nan Ya ƙaddara shi ƙaddarãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًا وَلَا حَيَوٰةً وَلَا نُشُورًا
verses.english: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka riƙi abũbuwan bautawa, baicin Shi, bã su yin halittar kõme alhãli sũ ne ake halittãwa kuma bã su mallakar wa kansu wata cũta ko wani amfãni, kuma bã su mallakar mutuwa kuma bã su mallakar rãyarwa, kuma bã su mallakar tãyarwa.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ وَأَعَانَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءُو ظُلْمًا وَزُورًا
verses.english: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Wannan bã kõme ba ne fãce ƙiron ƙarya da (Muhammadu) ya ƙirƙira shi, kuma waɗansu mutãne na dabam suka taimake shi a kansa." To, lalle ne sun jẽ wa zãlunci da karkacẽwar magana.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ٱكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.english: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Tatsũniyõyi ne na farko ya rurrbũta, sai sũ ake shibtarsu a gare shi sãfe da yamma."

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "wanda Yake sanin asĩri a cikin, sammai da ƙasane Ya saukar da shi. Lalle ne shĩ Ya kasance Mai gãfara, Mai, jin ƙai."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَالِ هَـٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِى فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا
verses.english: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Mẽne ne ga wannan Manzo, yanã cin abinci, kuma yanã tafiya a cikin kãsuwanni! Don me ba a saukar da malã'ika zuwa gare shi ba, dõmin ya kasance mai gargaɗi tãre da shi?

verses.arabic: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٌ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُورًا
verses.english: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
verses.hausa: "Kõ kuwa a jẽfo wata taska zuwa gare shi, kõ kuwa wata gõna ta kasance a gare shi, yanã ci daga gare ta?" Kuma azzãlumai suka ce: "Bã ku bin kõwa, fãce mutum sihirtacce:"

verses.arabic: ٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ فَضَلُّوا۟ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
verses.hausa: Ka dũba yadda suka buga maka misãlai sai suka ɓace, dõmin haka bã su iya bin tafarki.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِىٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًۢا
verses.english: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.
verses.hausa: Albarka ta tabbata ga wanda idan Ya so, Yã sanya maka mafi alhẽri daga wannan (abu): gõnaki, ƙõramu na gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, kuma Ya sanya maka manyan gidãje.

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
verses.english: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sun ƙaryata game da Sã'a, alhãli kuwa Mun yi tattalin wuta mai tsanani ga wanda ya ƙaryata (manzanni) game da Sa'a.

verses.arabic: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفِيرًا
verses.english: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.
verses.hausa: Idan ta gan su daga wani wuri mai nĩsa, sai su ji sautin fushi da wani rũri nãta.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مَكَانًا ضَيِّقًا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا۟ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا
verses.english: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan an jẽfa su a wani wuri mai ƙunci daga gare ta, sunã waɗanda aka ɗaure ciki daidai, sai su kirãyi halaka a can.

verses.arabic: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَٰحِدًا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا
verses.english: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
verses.hausa: Kada ku kirãyi halaka guda, kuma ku kirãyi halaka mai yawa.

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَآءً وَمَصِيرًا
verses.english: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Shin, wancan ne mafi alhẽri, kõ kuwa Aljannar dawwama wadda aka yi wa'adi ga mãsu taƙawa? Tã zama, a gare su, sakamako da makõma."

verses.arabic: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَـٰلِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًا مَّسْـُٔولًا
verses.english: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.
verses.hausa: "Sunã da abin da suke so, a cikinta sunã madawwama. Wannan ya kasance wa'adi abin tambaya a kan Ubangijinka."

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِى هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا۟ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
verses.english: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"
verses.hausa: Kuma rãnar da Yake tãra su da abin da suke bauta wa, baicin Allah sai Ya ce: "Shin kũ nekuka ɓatar, da bãyiNa, waɗannan, ko kuwa su ne suka ɓata daga hanya?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِى لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بُورًا
verses.english: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."
verses.hausa: suka ce: "Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Ka, bã ya kasancẽwa agare mu, mu riƙi waɗansu majiɓinta, baicin Kai, kuma amma Kã jiyar da su dãɗi sũ da ubanninsu har suka manta da Tunãtarwa, kuma sun kasance mutãne ne halakakku."

verses.arabic: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًا وَلَا نَصْرًا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًا كَبِيرًا
verses.english: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne, sun ƙaryata game da abin da kuke cẽwa, sabõda haka bã ku iya karkatarwa ga (maganarsu), kuma ba ku iya taimako (ga hana azãba), kuma wanda ya yi zãlunci a cikinku zã Mu ɗanɗana masa azãba mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِى ٱلْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا
verses.english: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aika ba, a gabãninka daga Manzanni, fãce lalle sũ haƙĩƙa sunã cin abinci kuma sunã tafiya a cikin kasuwõyi. Kuma Mun sanya sãshen mutãne fitina ga sãshe. Shin kunã yin haƙuri? Kuma Ubangijia Ya kasance Mai gani.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْ عُتُوًّا كَبِيرًا
verses.english: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda bã su fatan haɗuwa da Mu suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar da malã'ĩku ba a kanmu, kõ kuwa mu ga Ubangijinmu?" Lalle ne sun kangara a cikin rãyukansu, kuma suka yi tsaurin kai, tsaurin kai mai girma.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.english: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."
verses.hausa: A rãnar da suke ganin malã'iku bãbu bushãra a yinin nan ga mãsu laifi kuma sunã cẽwa,"Allah Ya kiyãshe mu!"

verses.arabic: وَقَدِمْنَآ إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ مِنْ عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هَبَآءً مَّنثُورًا
verses.english: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka gabãta zuwa ga abin da suka aikata daga aiki, sai Muka sanya shi ƙũra wãtsattsiya.

verses.arabic: أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌ مُّسْتَقَرًّا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًا
verses.english: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
verses.hausa: Ma'abũta Aljanna a rãnar nan sũ ne mafi alhẽri ga matabbata kuma mafi kyaun wurin ƙailũla.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلْغَمَـٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
verses.english: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
verses.hausa: Kuma a rãnar da sama take tsattsãgewa tãre da gizãgizai, kuma a saukar da malã'iku, saukarwa.

verses.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرًا
verses.english: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
verses.hausa: Mulki a rãnar nan, na gaskiya, yanã ga Mai rahama, kuma ya zama yini, a kan kãfirai, mai tsanani.

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى ٱتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.
verses.hausa: Kuma rãnar da azzãlumi yake cĩzo a kan hannayensa, yanã cẽwa "Ya kaitõna! (A ce dai) na riƙi hanya tãre da Manzo!

verses.arabic: يَـٰوَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا
verses.english: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.
verses.hausa: "Ya kaitõna! (A ce dai) ban riƙi wãne masõyi ba!

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ ٱلذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَنِى ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ خَذُولًا
verses.english: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa ya ɓatar da ni daga Tunãwa a bãyan (Tunãwar) ta je mini."Kuma Shaiɗan ya zama mai zumɓulẽwa ga mutum.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا
verses.english: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
verses.hausa: Kuma Manzo ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Lalle mutãnena sun riƙi wannan Alƙur'ãni abin ƙauracẽwa!"

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُوًّا مِّنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًا وَنَصِيرًا
verses.english: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.
verses.hausa: Kuma kamar haka ne, Muka sanya maƙiyi daga mãsu laifi ga kõwane Annabi. Kuma Ubangijinka Ya isa ga zama Mai Shiryarwa, kuma Mai taimako.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ جُمْلَةً وَٰحِدَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَـٰهُ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.english: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar da Alƙur'ãni a kansa ba, jimla guda?" kamar wancan! Dõmin Mu ƙarfafa zũciyarka game da shi, kuma Mun jẽranta karanta shi da hankali jẽrantawa.

verses.arabic: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
verses.english: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã zã su zo maka da wani misãli ba, fãce Mun je maka da gaskiya da mafi kyau ga fassara.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda ake tãyarwa a kan fuskõkinsu, zuwa ga Jahannama, waɗancan sũ ne mafi sharri ga wuri, kuma mafi ɓacẽwa ga hanya.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ وَزِيرًا
verses.english: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, Mun bai wa Mũsã Littãfi, kuma Mun sanya ɗan'uwansa, Hãrũna, mataimaki tãre da shi.

verses.arabic: فَقُلْنَا ٱذْهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا
verses.english: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka ce: "Ku tafi, kũ biyu, zuwa ga mutãnen nan waɗanda suka ƙaryata game da ãyõ yinMu." sai Muka darkãke su, darkãkewa.

verses.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا۟ ٱلرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ ءَايَةً ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.english: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma mutãnen Nũhu, a lõkacin da suka ƙaryata Manzanni, Muka nutsar da su, kuma Muka sanya su wata ãya ga mutãne, kuma Muka yi tattalin azãba mai raɗaɗi ga azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًۢا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.english: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
verses.hausa: Da Ãdãwa da Samũdãwa, da mutanen Rassi, da waɗansu al'ummomi, a tsakãnin wannan, mãsu yawa.

verses.arabic: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلَ ۖ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًا
verses.english: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.
verses.hausa: Kuma kõwannensu Mun buga masa misãlai, kuma kõwanne Mun halakar da (shi), halakarwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَى ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا۟ يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًا
verses.english: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, (¡uraishi) sun jẽ a kan alƙaryar nan wadda aka yi wa ruwa, ruwan azãba. Shin, ba su kasance sun gan ta ba? Ã'a, sun kasance bã su ƙaunar tãyarwa (a ¡iyãma).

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا
verses.english: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun gan ka, bã su rikon ka fãce da izgili, (sunã cẽwa) "Shin, wannan ne wanda Allah Ya aiko, Manzo?

verses.arabic: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوْلَآ أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ ٱلْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, yã yi kusa ya ɓatar da mu daga Ubangijinmu, in bã dõmin da muka yi haƙuri a kansu ba."Kuma zã su sani a lõkacin da suke ganin azãba, wãne ne mafi ɓacẽwa ga hanya!

verses.arabic: أَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
verses.english: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
verses.hausa: Shin, kã ga wanda ya riƙi UbangiJinsa son zuciyarsa? shin, to, kai ne ke kasancẽwa mai tsaro a kansa?

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.
verses.hausa: Ko kanã zaton cẽwa mafi yawansu sunã ji, kõ kuwa sunã hankali? sũ ba su zama ba fãce dabbõbin gida suke. Ã'a, sũ ne mafi ɓacẽwa ga hanya.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا
verses.english: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.
verses.hausa: Ashe, ba ka dũba ba zuwa ga Ubangijinka, yadda Ya miƙe inuwa? Kuma dã Yã so dã Yã bar ta tsaye cif, sa'an nan Muka sanya rãnã mai nũni a kanta.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًا يَسِيرًا
verses.english: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka karɓe ta (inuwa) zuwa gare Mu, karɓa mai sauƙi.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا
verses.english: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
verses.hausa: Kuma shĩ ne wanda Ya sanya muku dare ya zama tũfa da barci ya zama hũtãwa, dã yini ya zama lokacin tãshi (kamar Tashin ¡iyãma).

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً طَهُورًا
verses.english: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water
verses.hausa: Kuma Shi ne Ya aika iskõkin bushãra gaba ga rahamarSa, kuma Muka saukar da ruwa mai tsarkakẽwa daga sama.

verses.arabic: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا
verses.english: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.
verses.hausa: Dõmin Mu rãyar, game da shi, gari matacce, kuma Mu shayar da shi dabbõbi da mutãne mãsu yawa daga abin da Muka halitta.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا
verses.english: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun sarrafa shi (Alƙur'ãni) a tsakãninsu, dõmin su yi tunãni, sai dai mafi yawan mutãnen sun ƙi fãce kãfirci.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا
verses.english: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
verses.hausa: Kuma da Mun so, haƙĩƙa dã Mun aika da mai gargaɗi a ciƙin kõwace alƙarya.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَـٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا
verses.english: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka kada ka yi ɗã'ã ga kãfirai, ka yãke su, da shi, yãƙi mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.english: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.
verses.hausa: Kuma shĩ ne Ya garwaya tẽkuna biyu, wannan mai dãdi, mai sauƙin haɗiya, kuma wannan gishiri gurɓatacce, kuma Ya sanya wani shãmaki a tsakãninsu da kãriya mai shãmakacẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا
verses.english: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
verses.hausa: Kuma Shi ne Ya halitta mutum daga ruwa, sai Ya sanya shi nasaba da surukuta, kuma Ubangijinka Ya kasance Mai ĩkon yi.

verses.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًا
verses.english: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã bauta wa, baicin Allah, abin da bã ya amfãnin su, kuma bã ya cũtar su, kuma kãfiri ya kasance mai taimakon (Shaiɗan) a kan Ubangijinsa.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
verses.english: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
verses.hausa: Ba Mu aika ka ba sai kana mai bãyar da bushãra, kuma mai gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa fãce wanda ya so ya riƙi wata hanya zuwa ga Ubangijinsa."

verses.arabic: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱلْحَىِّ ٱلَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
verses.english: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -
verses.hausa: Kuma ka dõgara a kan Rãyayye wanda bã Ya mutuwa, kuma ka yi tasbĩhi game da gõde Masa. Kuma Yã isa zama Mai ƙididdigewa ga laifuffukan bãyinSa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۚ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَسْـَٔلْ بِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
verses.english: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.
verses.hausa: Wanda Ya halitta sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu, a cikin kwãnuka shida sa'an nan Yã daidaitu a kan Al'arshi Mai rahama, sai ka tambayi mai bãyar da lãbãri game da Shi.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا۟ وَمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًا ۩
verses.english: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.
verses.hausa: Idan aka ce musu, "Ku yi sujada ga Mai rahama." Sai su ce: "Mene ne Mai rahama? Ashe zã mu yi sujada ga abin da kuke umurnin mu?"Kuma wannan (magana ta ƙãra musu gudu.

verses.arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا
verses.english: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
verses.hausa: Albarka ta tabbata ga Wanda Ya sanya masaukai (na tafiyar wata) a cikin sama kuma Ya sanya fitila da watã mai haskakewa a cikinta.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا
verses.english: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.
verses.hausa: Kuma Shĩ ne wanda Ya sanya dare da yini a kan mayẽwa, ga wanda yake son ya yi tunãni, kõ kuwa ya yi nufin ya gõde.

verses.arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلْجَـٰهِلُونَ قَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا
verses.english: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,
verses.hausa: Kuma bãyin Mai rahama su ne waɗanda ke yin tafiya a kan ƙasa da sauƙi, kuma idan jãhilai sun yi musu magana, sai su ce: "Salãma" (a zama lafiya).

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًا وَقِيَـٰمًا
verses.english: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke kwãna sunã mãsu sujada da tsayi a wurin Ubangijinsu.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
verses.english: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke cẽwa "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka karkatar da azãbar Jahannama daga gare mu. Lalle ne, azãbarta tã zama tãra

verses.arabic: إِنَّهَا سَآءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.english: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne ita ta mũnana ta zama wurin tabbata da mazauni."

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُوا۟ لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا۟ وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا۟ وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا
verses.english: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke idan sun ciyar, bã su yin ɓarna, kuma bã su yin ƙwauro, kuma (ciyarwarsu) sai ta kasance a tsakãnin wancan da tsakaitãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّفْسَ ٱلَّتِى حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا
verses.english: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda bã su kiran wani ubangiji tãre da Allah, kuma bã su kashe rai wanda Allah Ya haramta fãce da hakki kuma bã su yin zina. Kuma wanda ya aikata wancan, zai gamu da laifuffuka,

verses.arabic: يُضَـٰعَفْ لَهُ ٱلْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا
verses.english: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -
verses.hausa: A riɓanya masa azãba a Rãnar ¡iyãma. Kuma ya tabbata a cikinta yanã wulakantacce.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ حَسَنَـٰتٍ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.english: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
verses.hausa: Sai wanda ya tũba, kuma ya yi ĩmãni, kuma ya aikata aiki na ƙwarai to, waɗancan Allah Yanã musanya miyãgun ayyukansu da mãsu kyau. Allah Ya kasance Mai gãfara Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابًا
verses.english: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya tũba, kuma ya aikata aiki mai kyau, to, lalle ne sai ya tũba zuwa gaAllah.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِٱللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا۟ كِرَامًا
verses.english: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke bã su yin shaidar zur, kuma idan sun shũɗe ga yasassar magana sai su shũɗe suna mãsu mutumci.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا۟ عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا
verses.english: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke idan an tunãtar da su da ãyõyin Allah, bã su saukar da kai, sunã kurame da makãfi.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَٱجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.english: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke cẽwa "Yã Ubangijinmu! Ka bã mu sanyin idãnu daga mãtanmu da zũriyarmu, kuma Ka sanya mu shũgabanni ga mãsu taƙawa."

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ ٱلْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَـٰمًا
verses.english: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
verses.hausa: Waɗannan anã sãka musu da bẽne, sabõda haƙurin da suka yi, kuma a haɗa su, a cikinsa, da gaisuwa da aminci.

verses.arabic: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.english: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
verses.hausa: Suna madawwama a cikinsa. Ya yi kyau ga zama matabbaci da mazauni.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا
verses.english: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ubangijĩna ba Ya kula da ku in bã dõmin addu'arku ba. To, lalle ne, kun ƙaryata, sabõda haka al'amarin zã ya zama malizimci."
